note.p: Research Field: Natural history, anthropology, comparative anatomy
Education: Studied at Jena and Gottingen. MD (1755)
Career: Professor Extraordinarius (1776) and Professor Ordinarius (1778-1840) of Medicine, Gottingen
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1840 No 45 pp 265-267
References: Linde Katritzky, 'Coleridge's Links with Leading Men of Science' in NR 1995 vol 49 pp 261-276
